mapper.insert: insert into t_work (f_id, f_teaching_id, f_work_project_id, f_student_id, f_score, f_submittime, f_returntime, f_status, f_is_delete, f_createtime, f_updatetime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teachingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workProjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{submittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{returntime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_work
f_teaching_id = #{teachingId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_work_project_id = #{workProjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_submittime = #{submittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_returntime = #{returntime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
f_createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_work set f_teaching_id = #{teachingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_work_project_id = #{workProjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_submittime = #{submittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_returntime = #{returntime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, f_createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tw.f_id, tw.f_teaching_id, tw.f_work_project_id, tw.f_student_id, tw.f_status, ts.f_id as studentId ,ts.f_number as studentNumber,ts.f_name as studentName, twp.f_id as workProjectId,twp.f_name as workProjectName, ta.f_name as academyName, te.f_enrollment_year as enrollmentYear, tc.f_name as className from t_work tw left join t_student ts on tw.f_student_id = ts.f_id left join t_work_project twp on tw.f_work_project_id = twp.f_id left join t_academy ta on ts.f_academy_id = ta.f_id left join t_enrollment_year te on ts.f_enrollment_id = te.f_id left join t_class tc on ts.f_class_id = tc.f_id where tw.f_is_delete = false and tw.f_teaching_id = #{teachingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*) from t_work where f_is_delete = false and f_teaching_id = #{teachingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
